description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之設計法及統計分析法，其中包括：單因子實驗 ，完全區集設計 ，不完全區集設計 ，多因子實驗 ，部份因子實驗 ，變異數分析 ，迴歸分析 ， 最佳化
description.en: Basic ideas of experimental design with applications; completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments, incomplete block designs in general; determination of optimum factor combinations; basic ideas of optimal design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.en: Study of Design Thoughts and Movements

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 造形藝術是含蓋平面與立體之形的組合，造形藝術包容室內與室外的公共藝術，有美化環境陶冶人性的功能。城市、社區的美化和總體營造需而以造形藝術原理來發揮應用。本課程著重在理論與視覺化之研究。
description.en: Study of theory and visualized practice of art form that consists of two and three dimension form study including their visual features and ways of composition.

name.zh: 室內空間與家具設計研究
name.en: Study into Interior Space and Furniture Design

description.zh: 講授人、家具、環境之介面，進而探討室內空間機能、生活機能與家具之關係性。以家具為室內空間中之機能元素之一，探討家具設計之創新思維。
description.en: A general study of interface among man, furniture and environment that related to space function, living function and the use of furniture. Design philosophy of furniture, which is considered as a functional element in interior space, is to be deliberating in the study.

description.zh: 全適性設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

name.zh: 電腦媒介溝通與設計研究

description.zh: 從社會文化面、心理面、設計面，探討電腦媒介溝通與設計的關係與問題，並研究以電腦為媒介的溝通與設計，對群體、人與人間的行為模式、決策支援、媒體適當性等的影響，以期建立專案設計研究的溝通與設計原則。
description.en: From the social and cultural, philosophical and design perspectives, this course is to study the concerns and issues of computer-mediated communication and design, and to further explore the effects of computer-mediated communication and design related to group interaction, interpersonal behaviour, decision support, media appropriateness etc. This study also intends to establish the design principles of mediated communication and design for case study research

description.zh: 本課程針對市場上以設計力成功商品之「市場研究」或「行銷策略」為研究對象。探討案例有關之「機會發現」、「公司背景資源分析」、「策略形成模式」、「研發組織與程序」、「可行性研究」、「評估與排序」等主題，藉以發展及實際演練新的提案。
description.en: This course prepares and develops the skills ,knowledge and professionalism essential for their contribution to the most successful design planning which concerned about the fields study；Opportunity identification, Market Research ,Strategic Models, Research and Development Organizations and those Development Process, Feasibility Study, Evaluation and Priority Arrangement.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 探討人類各種生活行為所必需的空間特性、空間機能及其相互間的關連性，並進行有關空間設計的理念方法論、評價方法等的研究，藉此達到更豊富及理想的居住空間的設計
description.en: A general study of theory of space in relation to interior and exterior environmental situations people live. This course introduces, discusses, and study the physical and psychological needs of space characters as people live and working in.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 本課程探討物件導向程式設計的原理, 語言與環境, 基本設計方法,  並以課程專題製作的方式使學者熟稔物件導向觀念. 課程內容: 物件與類別, 訊息傳遞, 繼承, 組合, 虛擬方法與多型性, 模板, 物件導向語言與環境, 專題
description.en: This course investigates the principles, languages and environments, and elementary design methods for object-oriented programming.  Students will be required to complete a term programming project. Course contents: Class and object, message passing, inheritance, composition, virtual methods and polymorphism, templates,  object-oriented languages and environments, term project.

description.zh: 1.單元測試 2.互動測試 3.整合測試 4.分析與設計模型測試 5.功能測試 6.圖形介面測試 7.系統測試
description.en: 1.Unit testing 2.Interactin testing 3.Integration testing 4.Analysis and design model testing 5.Functional testing 6.GUI Testing 7.System testing

description.zh: 1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 地下水對人類而言扮演相當重要的角色（特別在飲用水方面），但隨著工商的發達，其來自人為或自然的威脅卻與日遽增，本課程除可讓學生瞭解地下水水及水力等基本原理外，亦著重污染等傳輸行為之解析，以為規劃及管理地下水資源之依據。
description.en: In as mush as ground water provides drinking water to so many people, the quality of ground water is very important. Ground water may be contaminated from natural sources or he acts of humans. The ground water hydraulic and transport are discussed. Then the ground water contamination can be controlled.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括：1.污水下水道系統規則  2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general designing concept of wastewater treatment system, and makes student to understand how to make a design of wastewater treatment system, which combine quality, economizatin and high efficiency. The contents of the course include:rules of sewerage system, design of pipe system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment.

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

name.en: The technique of disaster prevention on soil and water

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學、水文學、統計學土壤沖蝕(2)、小集水區求Q、模型理論、輸砂理論、防洪工程、防砂工程、排水工程、土石流(2)、防災技術(工法)、專題討論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, Hydrology, StatisticsIntroduction, Soil erosion, Rational formula, Sediment transport, Flood control, Drainage engineering, Debris flow, Techniques of disaster prevention, Seminar

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.en: The Software of Mechanical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）Matlab  and  toolkit 之使用
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid  design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Application of  Matlab and toolkit

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 1.動態系統之機械負載：加速度、摩擦、位移及外力負載  2. 動態系統之模型化處理 3. 動態模擬與分析 4. 電腦輔助動態模擬 5. 結論
description.en: 1. System dynamic mechanical loading effects, including inertia, friction, displacement and forcing effects. 2. Dynamic system modeling 3. Dynamic analyses and simulations. 4. CAD-simulations  5. Conclusions.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

description.zh: 電子商務課程包含下列課題：(1)網路經濟 (2)電子化企業 (3)企業策略 (4)電子商務的網路基礎建設 (5)供應鍊管理 (6)企業間商務 (7)電子化行銷等。電子商務在擴展傳統企業經營的管道，提供以客戶為中心的解決知道。電子商務也將連結客戶關係、知識管理與企業智慧以便提供更好的服務
description.en: The course of E-Commerce provides our students the following topics：(1) webonomics (2) electronic-business(e-B) (3)business strategy (4)e-commerce infrastructure (5) supply chain management (6)business-to-business (B2B) commerce (7)e-marketing etc. E-commerce extends the reach of traditional business operation systems to provide customer-centric solution. It also links customer relationship, knowledge management, and business intelligence to provide another channel of running business.

description.zh: 1.參數化設計之介紹及應用2.3D零件之建立及組立3.工程圖之製作4.零件設計之變更5.進階混成（Blend）特徵設計6.進階掃成（Sweep）特徵設計7.進階掃混成（Swept  Blend ）特徵設計8.進階曲面特徵設計9.進階零件組立10.進階工程圖製作
description.en: 1.Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design.2.Construction and Assembly of 3D Parts.3.Engineering Drawing Creation.4.Part Manipulation and Relations.5.Advanced Blend Feature Design.6.Advanced Sweep Feature Design.7.Advanced Swept Blend Feature Design.8.Advanced Surface Feature Design.9.Advanced Part Assembly.10.Advanced Engineering Drawing.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 每週六小時二學分的專業必修課，旨在訓練碩一新生能在短時間內學習各種生物科技必須且基本的實驗技術並能有通盤的了解。課程的安排除了在生物科技所的教授實驗室中學習外，也將安排學生至中央研究院、國立臺灣大學、長庚大學及醫院、國防醫學大學及業界生物科技公司學習先進的生物科技的實驗方法和技術。
description.en: This course will provide students to learn essential and basic methods and experiments in biotechnology. The students must learn the methods and experiments in laboratories of the professors in Institute of Biotechnology, Academia Sinica, National Taiwan University, Chang Gung University, National Defense University and biotech companies.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程大學部畢業生。生物程序是應用工程原理，採用生物催化劑來設計、發展化工程序。這些程序有許多應用，諸如生產化合物或分解破壞有害的物質。工程的知識，尤其是化學工程是成功拓展地生物程序所必須的。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledge of bioprocess to traditional chemical engineers. Bioprocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze processes using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The knowledge of the engineering, particularly the chemical engineering, will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹生物催化劑-酵素-之基礎知識。內容包括酵素之成份、特性、應用及調製。酵素能催化加速反應速度，由於降低活化能。但不能改變化平衡。酵素泛用於工業上，特別在醫藥上有很重要的用途。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of biocatalysts, including its compositions, characteristics, application, and their preparation. Enzymes accelerate the rates of reactions, by decreasing activation energy, however, they does not change chemical equilibrium. Enzymes are widely used in industry and have significant medical application.

description.zh: 分子生物學為現代生物科技尤其是基因工程的基礎學問。課程內容深入探討生物的四大類分子： DNA 及 RNA，蛋白質，脂質，以及醣類分子。並且詳細探討現代分子生物學之中心思想，包含DNA 複製、轉錄、轉譯等。
description.en: Molecular biology is the fundamental of modern biotechnology, especially genetic engineering. Students learn what are DNA, RNA, protein, lipid, and carbohydrate and how do they work in this course. The central dogma of modern molecular biology, including DNA replication, transcription, and translation, is the major topic of this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於強化並提昇學生在中、英文學術與專業論文寫作上的能力與表達。內容包括：1.介紹工程研究的本質及科學家的思考邏輯；2.相關文獻資料的選用與閱讀；3.研究主題的寫作計畫與大綱；4.論文格式、寫作各項要求、段落銜接、病句分析及文法修辭等；5.好文章的組成要素，譬如是否精確報導事實？如何進一步討論數據測量的是非、新舊、優劣？以及是否解決問題的重點等？6.研究計畫書及論文的評審與出版；7.其他注意事項，含如何運用電腦媒體及網路製作圖表、簡報、履歷表、求職信、推薦函以及正確且合理使用他人的著作資料等。
description.en: 1.Nature of engineering research, thinking and logic of scientists.2.Reading and understanding literature and problems in research.3.Planning process and preliminary outlines before a scientific writing.4.Style, format, writing requirements, paragraph transition, sentence coherence, and grammar rhetoric for a scientific paper.5.Key elements of a fine paper, i.e. being a precise report of facts, being a concise interpretation of measured data and their comparisons and analysis, and being a new finding or solution for a research problem.6.Submission, reviewing and publication of research proposals and papers.7.Tips on writing with the aid of computer tools and websites include the making of tables, graphs, oral presentations, resumes, and placement letters.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括緒論、基本生物化學的介紹、基因體學、基因資料庫、蛋白質體學、蛋白質資料庫、序列排列和演化樹、蛋白質結構和藥物開發、生物資訊未來展望。
description.en: This course contains introduction, introduction of basic biochemistry, genomics, gene database, proteomics, protein database, sequence alignment and evolutionary trees, protein structure and drug discovery, and the outlook in bioinformatics.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

description.zh: 1. 機率空間2. 隨機變數、向量、程序3. 期望值，隨機序列的收斂性和大數法則4. 穩定性隨機程序5. 有用的隨機程序
description.en: 1. probability space2. Random variable, vectors and processes3. Expectation ,converges of random sequence and Law of large number4. Stationary processes and ergodic propertis5. Useful random processes

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

name.zh: 電腦電話整合與網路通訊

description.zh: 實驗一: CTI卡之Install, 與撥接電話處理實驗二: 偵測電話按鍵, 做身份與密碼驗證實驗三: 電話答錄機設計實驗四: 網路電話設計, Phone to Phone架構, Speech Coding(u-Law PCM,64kbps)實驗五: 網路電話設計, 語音編碼(G.729, CS-ACELP, 8kbps)實驗六: 網路電話設計, 網路流量分析, (Speech Packet Loss/Delay 統計)實驗七: 網路電話設計, 聲音補償(聲音封包加序號碼, 以及UDP遺失補償)實驗八: CTI與Text-to-Speech系統整合實驗九: 透過電話界面之Email-Reader實驗十: 透過電話界面之即時新聞閱讀機實驗十一: CTI與Speech Recognition(有限字彙辨識)系統整合實驗十二: 透過電話界面之電話號碼查詢與回應
description.en: Exp.1: CTI H/W Install, Call In/Out ProcessExp.2: DTMF Detection, Exp.3: Automatic Record/Play MachineExp.4: I-Phone with Speech Coding(u-Law PCM,64kbps)Exp.5: I-Phone with Speech Coding(G.729, CS-ACELP, 8kbps)Exp.6: Internet Packet Traffic Analysis, (Speech Packet Loss/Delay Statistic)Exp.7: I-Phone with Speech Compensation(Sequence No. + Speech Recover)Exp.8: CTI-Based Text-to-SpeechExp.9: CTI-Based Email-ReaderExp.10: CTI-Based News ReaderExp.11: CTI-Based Speech RecognitionExp.12: IVR System Development

description.zh: 中文課程概述：類比IC簡介、運算放大器設計與補償、電流鏡與高性能運算放大器、比較器、取樣與閂鎖電路、電壓參考與傳輸線電路、切換電容電路、數位與類比轉換電路、超取樣交換器、濾波器與傳輸器、鎖相迴路等。預修課程 ：電子學
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Opamp Design and Compensation，Advanced Current Mirrors and OPamps，Comparators，Sample and Hold Circuits， Voltage References and Translinear Circuits，Transforms and Filters，Switch-capacitor circuits (1)，Switch-capacitor circuits (2) ，D/A and A/D Converters，Nyquist-rate D/A Converters，Nyquist-rate A/D Converters，Oversampling Converters，Filters and Transconductors，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (1) ，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (2)。

description.zh: (1)	網路的應用和服務，例如Web， E-Mail， Network File Server (NFS)， Domain Name Server (DNS)。(2)	利用Sockets 和 remote procedure call(RPC)機制來設計client-server computing。(3)	Internet通信協定的設計。(4)	TCP和UDP運作原理。(5)	RIP和OSPF路由通信協定運作原理。(6)	實體層的LAN和WAN。
description.en: This course aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to Internet technologies. Unlike traditional courses, it pursues a top-down approach to the topic, starting with the application layer and then describing the transport and network layers, finally covering the physical layer.Among others, this course describes in details the network applications such as Web and Email and network services such as file service provided by Network File Server (NFS) and directory service provided by Domain Name Server(DNS); the design and implementation of client-server computing using Sockets and remote procedure call(RPC) mechanisms; the architecture and design of communication protocols; the operations of the transport layer provided by TCP and UDP; the packet routing layer as provided by IP and routing mechanisms and protocols (RIP, BGP); the physical layer of LANs and media technologies (Ethernet, Token Ring, FDDI, bridging); the physical layer of WANs (modulation, multiplexing, T1) and emergi

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

notes: 分子與科學館二樓電化教室

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容:工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: This course includes the subjects of making a computer system, which has the capability of solving problems intelligently, storaging knowledge reasoning, recognition, vision, representation, learning, perception, and analyzing problems.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 行銷看待是設計工程─它的組合由集成資料、模式、分析和電腦模擬設計一個有效的行銷規劃。我們的教學焦點：l 定義及介紹行銷工程與網路行銷l 策略性行銷l 戰術性行銷l 結合傳統行銷概念和新的網路行銷包括討論、遞送和技術。
description.en: Marketing resembles design engineering ─it consists of putting together data, models, analysis, and computer simulations to design effective marketing plans. We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

name.zh: 高等知識管理與專題研究

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 物件導向系統分析：以物件導向方法論將工業工程應用領域的資訊系統如企業資源規劃系統（ERP）或製造執行資訊系統（MES）系統性地分割成較小易明瞭的個體，該課程介紹分析時，所需的思考邏輯、程序，可使用的工具和分析的成果。
description.en: This course introduces some thinking logic, procedures, tools and artifacts of object-Oriented method that students can use to analyze some industrial engineering information system, such as ERP and MES.

description.zh: 本課程主要的目的是探討企業如何有效評估經營環境與競爭的本質並建立獨特而持續性的優勢，以啟動企業長期成長及獲利的引擎，利於不敗之地。
description.en: The objective of this class is to study the enterprises；business environment and the contents of computation effectively. To build up the unique advantage and pump the long-term groan profitable engine of the business is the main goal in this topic.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications, 2. robot motion ,analysis and control 3. robot end effectors 4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspection safety, training ,maintenance, and quality.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control. In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided. This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

name.zh: 半導體排程與系統分析

description.zh: 應用作業研究及統計手法於半導體製造課題及網路分析，該課程提供學生對於半導體製造的知識與了解及其關鍵之作業，並提供解決問題之技巧，課程除了教科書內容並包含文獻之研討。
description.en: This course will introduce the application of operations research and statistical methods to solving problems that involve semiconductor manufacturing operations including scheduling and network analysis.  In addition to the textbook, key papers from the literature will be used.  Students should gain knowledge of the complexity of semiconductor operations, key issues to the operations, and approaches for solving the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦控制在製程上之應用，深入研究電腦輔助製程規劃、同步工程，探討設計與測試之關係、設計與組裝之關係與整合、CAD/CAM界面設計、自動化檢測以及電腦整合製造。
description.en: This course will describe the real-time application of microcomputer systems to problems in manufacturing. In-depth study of automated and Computer Aided Process Planning (CAPP). Concepts, requirements, limitations, examples and implementation procedures of concurrent engineering, Just-In-Time Production System (JIT), design for testability, design for assembly, process selection, interface to CAD/CAM, and computer-integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 研讀戲劇作品，注重作品所反映的人文與社會環境的互動。上課方式以評析和討論為主，以加強口語表達能力及文學賞析能力，並以戲劇演練提升語言學習效果。
description.en: This course is intended to acquaint students with western plays which focus on the interaction between culture and society.  In addition to developing students' speaking ability through discussion, particular attention is given to the appreciation of literature.  Students are encouraged to perform some of the plays to enhance their proficiency in language and their interest in literature.

description.zh: 本課程在研討課程設計之理論與應用。
description.en: This course is designed to develop theory and applications in English curriculum.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

name.en: Theory and Technology on Particalte Matter

description.zh: 為使選習學生能熟悉環境中(尤其空氣中)之較大粒徑相關學理，本課程之介紹塵例行為其傳輸、反應之相關原理與防治、檢測分析等技術。其主要內容包括：1.環境中塵粒之來源、類型與分佈特性。2.塵粒傳輸理論。3.逸散現象之分析。4.揚塵理論。5.污染防治原理。6.檢測與分析技術。
description.en: Theory and Technology on Particalte Matter An introduction to the theory relative technology for particulate matter(pm) is firstly presented in the graduated course. Then, it will forcus on the following iterms to provide students a comprehensive and professional knowledge :1.Characteristics sources with particle size distriroution.2.Transport phenomena in air environmnet.3.Analysis of transport hpenomena for fugitive dust.4.Theory on particle entraiment or supension.5.Principle of control tenologies.6.Sampling and analysis for fugitive dust.

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹多媒體設計系統其中包括系統的操作技巧、運動與動畫製作技巧、互動與交談設計、軟體除錯與包裝、多媒體教材製作等相關技術。
description.en: This module is concerned with Multimedia Authoring Scripting and the use of Multimedia Development Tools and applying them in cross-platform multimedia production.  This course provides the student with a knowledge of the various concepts and techniques used in multimedia systems

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Operation and Maintenance of Water Plant

description.zh: 水處理廠操作與維護課程包括給水工程及污水工程設施之操作與維護,本課程為傳統衛生工程設施最主要之部份,內容涵蓋物理單元化學單元以及生物單元之操作維護,主要之設施包括前處理,混凝,沈澱,過濾,消毒,活性污泥,旋轉生物盤,接觸曝氣法以及污泥處理,處置單元之操作維護.
description.en: Water supply Engineering includes the system from water sources, intake, conveyor, purification and distribution. Water source will discuss about the intakes and resource conservation. Conveyor will have topics about layout, pumping and piping. Water treatment flow sheet is most important part in this course and the special treatment about odor problem is also studied.

description.zh: 給水系統的設計旨在充分供應計劃人口與計劃年限之計劃用水量，主要討論單元有：取水工程、輸水工程（動力管及壓力管之設計）、淨水工程（沈澱、混凝膠凝、過濾及消毒等）、配水工程（面積法、累積曲線法及經驗法等配水池設計方法、及各種配水管網之型式設計）等四大單元之設計，經由充份的習題演算，使學者熟悉給水系統設計方法。
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 使學習者瞭解土壤與岩石之性質對隧道設計、開挖之相互關係。課程內容包括隧道工程介紹、隧道之荷重及應力分佈、地質調查、支撐及襯砌設計、各類隧道施工之方法及計測儀器之說明。
A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉應用程式設計之原則、環境、及方法，內容含：(1)軟體發展程序, (2)軟體測試. (3)作業系統與應用程式之關係(4) 視窗環境 (5)網路環境 (6)系統整合
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments, methodologies, and principles of application software design. Topics include: 1. Software development process, 2. Software testing 3. Run-time environments 4.Window environments 5.Networking environments 6.System Integration

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子製造程序（其中最主要者為積體電路之製造程序）。首先說明製造方法上之三個 主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。
description.en: An introduction to the semiconductor manufacturing process. Courses include diffusion, microlithography and deposition.

description.zh: 由環境保護的觀點來了解化學工業及其他產業之污染源，並且教授資源回收、減廢技術、進而設計清潔生產製程，以達到廢棄物資源化與管理的最終目
description.en: This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and other industries. And the course will cover the techniques for waste recycle and reduction. Furthermore, the final goal is to design a cleaner technology process for achieving the waste minimization and waste management.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程教授非線性方程式、聯立方程式、常微分方程式及偏微分方程式等之數值解答技巧，並在電腦輔助下解決工程上之問題。
description.en: This course is a way to do higher mathematics problems on a computer.  It includes solving nonlinear equations, sets of equations, interpolation and curving fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, and differential equations.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程強調表面化學性質之基本原理及其應用。內容可分成三部份：（一）液體之表面張力、熱力學及有關表面電力方面之性質，潤溼、清潔、乳化及起泡。（二）固體表面化學強調固體表面之生成及鑑定，固液間之接觸角、吸附及溶液表面分子的黏著現象。（三）介紹固氣界面，氣體及蒸汽在固體表面上之吸附，化學吸附及催化。
description.en: The course describes the foundamental principles and the application of Surface Chemistry, which is concentrated in following three major fields:(1) The surface tension, thermodynamics of the liquids and their related electrical properties, wetting, cleaning, emulsification and foaforming.(2) The surface chemistry of solid state emphasizes the formation of a solid surface, its characterzation, the liquid-solid contact angle, the adsorption, and the adhesion phenomena on molecular basis.(3) The interfacial phenomena at the solid-gas interface, the adsorption of gas or vapor on the solid surface, the chemistry of adsorption and the catalysis.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電化學基礎並探討有機反應電化學研究之應用技術及設備。
description.en: An introduction and fundamentals of method and equipment for the study of electroorganic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 1.建築結構概述 2.建築結構設計規範及設計方法 3.建築結構載重 4.高樓結構系統規劃 5.高樓結構應力分析 6.高樓結構之動力分析 7.建築結構材料及其特性 8.鋼筋混凝土構造設計 9.鋼骨構造設計 10.鋼筋鋼筋混凝土構造設計 11.基礎設計 12.高樓結構設計與建造
description.en: 1.Introduction to building structures 2.The design codes, and methods of building structures 3.Loading of building structures 4.Planning of the high rise building structures 5.Stress analysis of the high rise building structures 6.Structural dynamic analysis of building ssssstructures 7.Material Characteristics of building structures 8.Design of reinforced concrete(RC)building structures 9.Design of steel building structures 10.Design of SRC building structures 11.Design of foundation 12.Construction of high rise building structures

name.en: Writing and presentation in the Technical Field

description.zh: 1. 工程寫作的基本技巧 工程寫作結構、段落、圖表的製作 國際單位與標點符號2. 升學與求職之寫作 簡歷表、自傳與讀書計畫、推薦信 碩士推甄注意事項3. 論文與職場之寫作 論文寫作項目與格式、參考文獻 備忘錄、會議記錄、產品說明書之寫法4. 口語表達之藝術 簡報、投影片製作 簡報面談注意事項5. 科技人的人文寫作

Thesis and Work Writing Items and format of a thesis Writing of references, memo and minutes of meeting4. Oral Presentation Making of films by PowerPoint Tips on interviewing skills5. Literature Writing by Technical Person

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: This class includes mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 為配合課程使學生有實際操作的經驗以獲得完整的知識，實習課程包括：篩析法、碎礦實習、磨機實習、自由沈降實習、安氏吸管粒度測定、重液選礦、濃集實習、薄水層選礦、靜電選礦、磁選、浮選、脫水及乾燥等實習項目。
description.en: The laboratory section of the mineral processing classes are designed to have student obtain hand-on experiences of various mineral processing operations.  The lab. includes screening, crushing, grinding operation, settling, size analysis, heavy medium separation, classification, sluicing, electrostatic and magnetic separations, flotation, dewatering and drying.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipmentinvolved are introduced in this class.  It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface).

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals.  The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 本課程為講授鋼鐵製造原理與技術。內容分兩單元，一為生鐵之製煉，另一為鋼之製煉。生鐵之製煉講述鐵礦石之還原反應及高爐操作之熱力學原理及其應用，以及高爐操作之技術發展。並介紹直接製鐵及溶融還原法之概要。鋼之製煉講述煉鋼之治金熱力學原理，並說明頂吹式純氧氣轉爐，底吹式純氧氣轉爐，頂底吹轉爐，電爐及平爐煉鋼法之冶煉技術。
description.en: The course is to lecture the principle and technique of making ferrous products, itscontent is divided into two parts, one is the refining of pig iron, the other is therefining of steel. The former one is to describe the reduction reaction of ferrousmine, and the thermal dynamics principle and application of a blast furnace, thetechnique development of a blast furnace operation as well. The latter one is todescribe the metallurgical thermal dynamics principle of steel making, and to describe the smelting techniquesof the converter with pure oxgen infusing from upper part or bottom, electric furnace, open hearth.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 講述鑄造學之基本原理，概念，以及實際應用技巧，基本原理上，以材料的凝固解析學為主。包括：熱傳導及流動性等基本原理。應用上包含金屬、非金屬、高分子等其他原材料之鑄造方法、技巧之介紹。
description.en: This course is a basic topics of  Foundry Technology in various materials.

description.zh: 一、合成方法--固相、溶液、氣相反應法二、成核與晶體成長機構與速率三、單晶合成-矽晶、石英及鑽石四、粉末合成-鈦酸鋇系、氧化鐵系、氧化鋯、氧化鋁、氧化鋅之合成五、薄膜技術簡介
description.en: 一、Method - solid liquid and vapor state reaction二、Mechanism and rate of neucleation and crystal growth三、Single crystal- silicon silica and diamond四、Powders- Barium titanite Ferrites Zirconia Alumina Zinc oxide五、Introduction to thin film techniques

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is devided into five units : 1). The Nineteenth Century : The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring",and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

description.zh: 充分了解各種家具與陳列品或配置品之材料的特性及其應用方法、技術以及在室內設計中之重要性。同時亦探討室內設計有關之建材種類、特性、防火安全性及其應用之方法，使室內設計之表現能達到居住生活上舒適與合理的效果。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with nature of furnishing and materials frequently used in furnishing. The application of various materials will be discussed including attribute categories, physical properties, flameproof standard and finishing process.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。

description.en: Fourier optics provides a description and analysis of the free-space propagation of light waves based on the theory of Fourier transform and linear systems. description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

And multistage Amp. Design8. Operational Amp Design9. Oscillator design.  10. Active filter Design.  11. Power supply Design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育哲學架構，課程包 括三大部份，第一部份探討哲學的基本課題與哲學和教育的關係；第 二部份探討傳統和當代教育哲學所面對的基本問題，以及它們對教育 實務所能提供的回應之道；第三部份涉及發展個人教育哲學之重要，方法與推行時可能受到的挑戰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The goal of this course is to offer a conceptual frame of educational philosophy. The course is divided into three sections. Part I deals with basic issuers in philosophy and the relationship between philosophy and education. Part II is a survey of how traditional and modern philosophies have faced the basic philosophic issuers, and the alternatives they have developed for educational practice. Part III discusses the need for developing personal philosophy of education, some ways of building such a philosophy, and some of the challenges involved in implementing that philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關教育心理學的系統知識使其在未來從事教職時，具最有效的方法瞭解，敘述，預測及其學生的行為並從而採用最佳的教學方式，以達成教育目標。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the systematic knowledge of educational psychology to the students who have the willingness to be teachers. It presents the students with the basic psychology theories of instructional process; mental-physical development; the principles of learning and instruction; the learning about motor and skill, words and concepts; cultivating of thinking and creative; motivation and interest in instructing process; the measurement of individual difference; proper instructions against differently mental students; teacher-student relationship and students behaviors; instruction evaluation; mental hygiene and health in school. After finishing this course, the persons will get the most effective methods to understand, describe or predict their students behaviors, and can choose the best instructional ways achieve the educational goal, when they become teachers in the future.

name.en: Materials and Methods of Teaching for Various Subjects

description.zh: 不同的課目有著不同的教學方式，及教學原理。本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生對其專業科目的特殊教學法有進一步的了解。使得在任教此一科目時能運用更適切適當的教學方法提高學生學習的效果。
description.en: There are different teaching styles and teaching theories for different courses. The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

description.zh: 讓學生對教育有總合而初步的認識，以培養初任教師的共信與共識。以及引起學生研習教育的興趣，以奠定其將來繼續研習之基礎。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers a introduction to students about the idea of general education and gives students some motivation about learning how to teach.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生學完了這門課以後在實際研究中能夠正確地選擇，運用統計方法。因此，本課程側重每一種統計方法的適用條件及不同方法之間的區別與聯繫。對於公式的推導及具體計算未作為重點來闡述。本課程在介紹平均數、標準差及相關系數等統計量的基本計算公式的同時，對於它們在次數分配表中的計算以及一些簡便算法、經驗公式也適當加以介紹，目的在於幫助學生更好地理解這些統計量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students know how to use properly static method to solve real problem. Students will learn the suitable condition for every different problem, mean, standard deviation, and basic calculation . Formula and complication calculation will not be the emphasis part.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生了解學校行政的實質內容，其包括了教務、訓導、總務、人事及公共關係等五項工作；就其實施歷程來看，含蓋了計畫、組織、溝通、領導及評鑑等五個步驟。學校行政人員既要對教務、訓導、總務、人事及公關，有深入的研究；對計畫、組織、溝通、領導與評鑑，也要加以探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students understand the system of school administration. The contents include (a) study affair (b) admonish (c) general affair (d) personnel affair (e) public relationship. The real procedures include (a) planning (b) organization (c) communication (d) leadership (e) evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關職業訓練與輔導的系統知識，使其在未來從事教職時，能提供學生適當適時就業資訊與諮詢服務，並且讓學生對外在世界的工作環境有更進一步的了解。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide a series of knowledge about occupation training and counseling. Students will get the information before jump into the job, and receive more information about outside world before leaving school.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下:(一)充實學生各種激發快樂學習、健康成長的學識，以培養適任的優良教師；（二）提供學生班級教學及班級導師工作的實務經驗與做法，使具備有效處理教學與班級事務的良好技能﹔(三)奠定學生熱忱積極經營班級之理念，養成學生教育專業精神，使其在從事教育工作時能發揮愛心與熱忱來欣賞及參與班級的各種活動。 本課程的內容涵蓋班級經營的學理基礎;班級經營的目標、計劃與評鑑;教學、行政之經營;導師的任務與素養;學生自治活動、教學情境佈置;班級氣氛與學習;班級的評量設計;有關安置、生活、學習、行為等方面的問題與對策等 本課程利用講授法、小組討論法、發表法等方式進行教學，盡量在教學過程中探討教室內各種發生的狀況尋求最佳解決方式，且進行發展積極、和諧、快樂的師生互動模式之探討以利學生在未來擔任教師時能駕輕就熟於班級經營工作，而達成本課程之目標 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(備註：本資料係由本校各教學單位、教務處課務組、進修部教務組、進修學院教務組及計網中心所共同提供！本資料僅供參考，正式資料仍以教務處、進修部、進修學院所公佈之書面資料為準。

「輔導工作是所有教育工作者的責任」。任何人都會遭遇問題，成長中的學生尤其有各式各樣的問題。身為人師，在教學過程中應輔導學生解決問題，以培養健康進取，有能力解決問題，適應環境的學生為己任。在本課程的目標即在透過對青春期挫折徵候的了瞭以及學者心理分析輔導法、個體心理輔導法、存在主義輔導法、理情輔導法、認知輔導法、溝通分析輔導法、行為輔導法等輔導理論，並配合實例分析使未來之教育工作人員獲得工作時的輔導知能以及培養輔導工作的志趣。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: When teaching, the teachers should keep in mind the duty to guide their students to overcome the frustration or to solve the difficult problems as to nurture the students to be healthy, positive, with their own abilities to overcome difficulties and to be apt to their environment. The object of this subject is to help the students with the willingness to be teachers get the knowledge and abilities of guidance on their teaching in the future, and develop their willingness and interests of guidance. This course presents the students with the units including to understand the symptom of adolescent frustration, the method of person-center approach, the method of rational-emotive therapy, the method of cognitive guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance, the method of behavior guidance. In addition, this course also introduces many practical cases so that the students can more effectively study the relative theories.

description.zh: 技職教育相關法令、大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例等主要法令；教育人員法律素質、公文基本概念、習作與處理。
description.en: Foundation of ceducational low, current educational policy and the procedusre of official document.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.
