name.en: Materials and Methods of Teaching for Various Subjects

description.zh: 不同的課目有著不同的教學方式，及教學原理。本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生對其專業科目的特殊教學法有進一步的了解。使得在任教此一科目時能運用更適切適當的教學方法提高學生學習的效果。
description.en: There are different teaching styles and teaching theories for different courses. The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

name.en: Materials and Methods of Teaching for Various Subjects

description.zh: 不同的課目有著不同的教學方式，及教學原理。本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生對其專業科目的特殊教學法有進一步的了解。使得在任教此一科目時能運用更適切適當的教學方法提高學生學習的效果。
description.en: There are different teaching styles and teaching theories for different courses. The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹在固液分離技術應用中,固體於液體間之行為,其中相關之基本理論包括:流體力學、界面現象、膠體行為、以及界面力的問題。至於相關設備介紹方面,將著重於資源回收單元設備之說明,例如:過濾、離心、浮除、沉降、混凝等。
description.en: In the basic theory introduction, theories related to solid and liquid interactions will be introduced, fluid mechanics, liquid and solid interfacial phenomena, colloidal behavior and interfacial forces. In terms of separation instruments, the operation principles of filters, centrifuge, flotation, settling, coagulation, etc. will be described.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：日文﹙一﹚或具備日文基礎片假名及平假名讀寫複習，問候語.簡單單字.字組詞語說明， 基楚日本語文法，公司及個人自我介紹，科技日語閱讀技巧解說，日文技術資料查尋及研讀，科技外來語及說明書講解與閱讀，技術用語及機械專業用日本語。
description.en: HIRAGANA and KATAKANA, Greeting sentences, Basic grammar and structure,  Introduce yourself and your company, Study technology Japanese, Read Japanese  guide book and illustrations, High-Techjapanese and mechanical Japanese.

description.zh: 在目前資訊爆增的社會中，從事教學工作確實不是一件很輕鬆的工作。當今國內的教育方式是大量的資訊必須利用有限的時間，在指定的空間內，傳播給必須接受者。此一工作勢必要借助於相當妥善的媒介或手段才能做到。因此，從事教育工作者如何研究和運用適切的媒體來教學已成為不可忽視的課題。本課程的重點在介紹教學媒體的涵義、分類與功能、如何進行教學傳播，以及媒體教學的基本理論。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

name.zh: 機電整合特論及實驗(二)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Mechatronic Engineering II

description.zh: 本課程包括理論與實務，由機電所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的內容包含機電整合與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of Institute of Mechatronic Engineering. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of innovative design, fabrication of MENS, etc., emphasizing in professional knowledge of Mechanical Electrical integration.

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 環境污染防治法規為現階段執行環境污染預防與環境管理之重要策略之一,本課程內容包括水污染防治,空氣污染防治,固體廢棄物,毒性物質管理,噪音管制以及環境影響評估等相關法規,授課涵蓋法規制定背景,重要管制規定,處理及處置規範以及相關之罰則.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the laws and regulations of environmental pollution control.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    奈米顆粒材料種類與應用，磁性流體、奈米熱傳流體及奈米晶種等，製造方法與設備，真空技  術與奈米顆粒製造，電弧製程控制技術，奈米顆粒操控，篩選過濾，奈米材料之安全性。
description.en: Magnetohydrodyamics,Nanofluid and Seeds, Manufacturing Methods, Arc Nanoparticle   Synthesis System, Vacuum system for Arc Synthesis System, Synthesis and Applications of  Nanoparticles, Nano-structured Thin Films and Seeds, Synthesis and Applications of  Seeds,  Hardware and Machines, Manufacturing processes control, Nanoparticles control and filterations  as well as the safeties of the Nanoparticles

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

name.zh: 自動化機構設計與實習

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用、實驗器材介紹、機構選用實例及實習。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors,        Introduction to Lab. Instruments, Examples and Lab's of mechanism selection.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。
description.en: (1) Applied quantum mechanics: Basic approach, simple quantum systems, time dependent quantum phenomena, statistical physics, transport phenomena, quantum  optics,  many-body effects.(2) Nano materials: Fundamental properties of material special physical properties diffusion and sintering characteristics, carbon nano tube related fabrication process and application.(3) Nanoparticles Technology: Property of nano particles fabrication, measuring analysis, some applications related with optoelectronics fluid, thermal, and biochemistry project.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹嵌入式系統設計之基本原理與方法,以使學生瞭解如何使用軟/硬體元件來設計嵌入式系統。課程內容包含:1.嵌入式系統之基本介紹2.客戶單一目的處理器(硬體)3.通用型處理器(軟體)4.標準單一目的處理器(周邊)5.記憶體6.介面7.設計實例-數位相機及PDA 8.IC設計技術9.設計方法10.ARM嵌入式微處理器之介紹11.ARM嵌入式微處理器之應用12軟硬體共同設計簡介13.SOC嵌入式系統簡介
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduction a methodology and theory of embedded system design.Then student can using hardware/software components to design an embedded system. The content of this course are shown as follows:1.An Introduction to Embedded System. 2.Custom Single-Purpose Processor:Hardtware. 3.General Puprose Processor:Software  4.Standard  Single-Purpose Process:Peripherals 5.Memory 6.Interfacing 7.Example-Digital Camera and PDA 8.IC Technology 9.Design Technology  10.ARM Embedded Microprocessor 11.ARM Embedded Microprocessor Applications 12. Introduction to Hardware/Software Co-Design 13. Introduction to Embedded System of System-on Chip

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 1.基本車輛動態簡介 2.駕駛人模型 3.引擎／動力系統控制 4.恆速行駛控制 5.防滑驅動/防鎖死煞車控制 6.四輪轉向控制 7.主動式／半主動式懸吊 8.智慧交通系統 9.主動式安全系統 10.複合動力控制系統
description.en: To provide an overview of Vehicle Dynamics and Control Systems of intelligent vehicles in ITS.  Students will learn introduction to vehicle dynamics, driver modeling, driving simulation, engine/power-train control, cruise control, traction control/ABS, four-wheel steering, steer-by-wire, active/semi-active suspension, intelligent traffic systems, active safety technologies, and advanced power-train technologies.  Upon completion of this course, students should be able to follow the literature on these subjects and perform independent design, research and development work in this field.

description.zh: 平面機構運動分析-解析法，空間機構運動分析-座標轉換，特殊機構分析-曲柄滑塊機構、轉向機構、萬向接頭，機構設計-運動產生器、函數產生器、路徑產生器，電腦輔助工程分析軟體之應用。
description.en: Planar Linkage Analysis by Analytical Method, Spatial Linkage Analysis by Coordinate Transformation, Special Mechanisms Analysis Including Slider-Crank, Steering Mechanism, and Universal Joint, Synthesis of Linkages for Motion Generation, Path Generation, and Function Generation, Application of CAE

description.zh: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由(7)資訊安全
description.en: This course provides a comperhensive overview of several topics related to mobile computing. These topics includes:(1)State-of-Art in Mobile (2)Data Management (3)Mobile Database and Transaction Management (4)Location Management, (5)Mobile IP (6)Unicast/Multicast Routing,and(7)Security.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹中國各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，使學生對中國各類藝術有初步瞭解，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括:1.建築部分：涵蓋宮殿、寺廟、陵墓、民居等不同建築類型，以及中國著名之庭園介紹。2.器物部分：講述中國玉器、金銀器、陶瓷器、琺瑯器、漆器、象牙、竹木器等。3.介紹自新石器時代以後之雕塑、佛像、明器等，欣賞其形式美、材質美與其表現涵意。4.解說中國繪畫史，各朝代重要畫家，就山水、花鳥、人物、畜獸等，分析其構圖，用筆用墨，使用皴法等。
description.en: The course is to equip students with the ability to understand and appreciate Chinese Art. Contents: 1.Architecture: including the architecture of palace, temple, emperor's mausoleum, residence, as well as famous gardens in China. 2.Wares: such as jade objects of China, gold and silver ware, ceramics and porcelain, cement ware, lacquer ware, ivory,bamboo, etc. 3.Sculpture: introducing clay statute of Buddha, ware, and appreciating the beauty and expression of art. 4.Painting: introducing the history of Chinese painting, master painters, and various painting; analyzing the making of a sketch of a painting, stroking, and inking, of landscape, flower-bird works, figure painting, and animal painting.

description.zh: (一)認識地球與地球科學  1.認識地球的重要性--經驗的與科學的角度2.地球科學家與地球知識3.地球知識的探究範圍--地球的結構(二)地球與星系的有機係4.宇宙的形成與大爆炸5.地球與銀河系6.地球的動力系統--內動力與外動力(三)岩石圈與人類棲居的範圍7.地球的內動力系統與地殼變動8.岩石圈的形成與特徵:從地質到地形9.岩石圈、陸地與人類活動的關係(四)水圈、大氣圈與自然環境皂動力10.水、空氣與土地的互動11.水循環與外動力系統(陽光)12.大氣運動與天氣變化(五)認識地球的本質13.地球作為人類的家14.節制與維護:人與自煞的和諧交往。
description.en: 1.Knowing the Earth and the science of Earth(1)The importance of knowing earth--its experiential and scientific role(2)Scientists of Earth and the knowlege of earth.(3)The  structure of earth.2.The organic relation between earth and galaxy (4)The formation of universe and Big-Bang.(5)The earth and Milky Way Galaxy.(6)The dynamic system of the earth.3.The lithosphere and the horizen of human habitat(7)The inner dynamic system of the earth and the crust change.(8)The formation and characteristic of the lithosphere:from geology to geomorphology.(9)The relation of the lithosphere,continental plate, and human activities.4.The hydrosphere,the atmosphere and the dynamic of the physical environment.(10)The interaction between water, air and land.(11)The hydrologic cycle and the outer dynamic system.(12)The air movement and the weather change.5.Knowing the nature of earth.(13)The earth as a living place for mankind.(14)Restriction and maintance: the harmonious relations between men and nature.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞與飲茶活動有關的文學名作，從而瞭解茶歷史與茶文化，認識歷代著名的茶人與茶事。並由欣賞茶以及相關的文物，體會飲茶的藝術與趣味。茶源自我國，然後逐漸成為世界性的飲料。因為飲茶活動富涵藝術與趣味的特質，茶也逐漸成為重要的社交媒介。在我國，茶結合了道家與禪學的思想，其實，茶不僅只是一種美味的飲料，茶道的理念更值得我們悉心探索，藉以浸潤生活的內涵。
description.en: This course aims at first making students acquainted with literature concerning tea by which a better understanding of tea personalities and anecdotes will be obtained and secondly, cultivating students' appreciation of a great variety of tea and cultural artifacts linking with tea by which interests in tea art will be kindled. Having been a luscious beverage brewed for some 3,000 years of Chinese history, tea now has a deep and far-reaching impact on the world. Since making tea illustrates the character of art and affords the delight of life, tea therefore build a bridge among all walks of life. Making tea, combined with Taoist School and Buddhist Meditation, at its uiumate attainment, is both an enjoyment and an artistic summation. The search for tea is a dual process of understanding tea's flavor as well as the thought with it.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 小本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.人類胚胎幹細胞、2.老化、3.癌症、4.細胞死亡、5.遺傳疾病、6.基因轉殖與剔除、7.人類基因體計劃、8.基因治療、9.複製人、10.基因改造食物、11.生物晶片、12.免疫與疫苗、13.人造器官、14.蛋白質結構生物學與生技製藥、15.未來展望。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講。
description.en: This course aims that the completion of human genome project will build up the prosperity of biotechnology industry. Enormous progress and propounding impacts from biotechnology will influence our future life. This class will focus on the latest developments of biology and interpret the tendency of biotechnology.The contents of this course include: 1.human embryonic stem cell、2.aging、3.Cancer、4.programmed cell death、5.Genetic diseases、6.Transgene and gene knock out、7.Heman genome project、8.Gene therapy、9.Heman cloning、10.Genetic modified food、11.Biochips、12.Immune System and Vaccine、13.Bioartificial organ、14.Structural Biology and Pharmaceutics、15.Future Prospect.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion.

description.zh: 本課程係初級日文(一)、(二)的延續，再利用半年一學期的時間，繼續增強學生對日語的興趣，加強學生對日語的簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識日本及日語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。授課內容：日常生活之對話、童謠、歌曲及民俗文化等。
description.en: This is a continue course of Primary Japanese(I) and (Ⅱ). Students are expected to keep their interests in study Japanese language, further improve their communication skills, better understand Japanese culture, and become globalization. The course contains: daily conversation, folk songs, music and traditional culture of Japan.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 語言是人類情感相互溝通的橋樑，促進人際關係的和諧，而如何把自己的想法、看法、非常輕鬆而正確的說出來，卻不是一件簡單的事。要想說的中肯、說得技巧，就必須經過一番學習與研究。這就牽涉到：與意學、語言學以及倫理學、理則學與表演術，讓別人聽了樂於接納。因此必須注意說話的內容、音調和儀態三方面的基本訓練，更更要注意時間、空間、對象，而有所不同。還要傾聽別人說話的美德。總之，會說不是胡說、亂說、愛說與白說，也就是能放能收、恰到好處。
description.en: Being the bridge of human communication,language improves personal relationship. But how to express oneself comfortably is not that simple. It needs practice and skill if one wants to speak to the point. This 「practice」involves semantics、linguistics、ethics、logic and performance. Therefore, the content、tone and deportment are all essential  elements to a successful speech. When to speak、where to speak and to whom to speak are various components of one's talk. To listen is more important than to speak.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 探究永恆的奧秘，追尋自然的真相，是寶石學中最令人癡狂的學習動力。當您望著各類寶石，欣賞它們顏色與光彩的同時，是否也能從另一個角度，去看看大自然千萬年的蘊化奇蹟，與結合多少後天資源使璞石發亮的過程？寶石領域一如大千世界，不但充滿了驚嘆，也佈滿了色彩。在課程內容上，將藉由豐富的教材，帶您上山下海，探訪寶石的故鄉，從伊麗莎白泰勒的鑽石，賈桂琳甘迺迪的珍珠項鍊、紅藍寶、祖母綠....或關之琳所買下的翡翠、日本皇太子妃的珍珠項鍊、慈禧太后的西瓜碧璽...等等，課程由淺入深循序漸進，不但能帶給您更豐富的珠寶常識，同時也能實際地藉實物練習，到兼具理論與實務的學習樂趣。
description.en: To probe the mystery of eternity, to searach for the answer of nature, is the charismatic power of learning inside gemology circles.  When you look at the variety of gemstones, do you appreciate their color and luster?  Furthermore, do you also see beyond the beauty and discover the miracle of a gem's thousand-year life?  To see how the multi-complicated processes combine to take a raw stone from the earth and turn it intoa beautiful finished gemstone?A gem itself is like the no-bounds world, not only full of fascination but also full of colors.  We are going to, by means of plentiful materials, bring each of you into the spectacular mining districts.  From Elizabeth Taylor's "TAYLOR-BURTON" diamond, Catherine Kennedy's jewelry box-pearls, rubies, emeralds...l to Empress Dowager Tzu-Hsi's Watermelon Tourmaline... etc, we will lead you step by step into this fasciating world of gems, and you will also be given practical lessons to probe theories in order to achieve great success in st

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

name.en: Medical Trend in the New Era

description.zh: 本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.新醫療關係與諮詢、2.如何與醫師對話、3.高關注照護醫療倫理、4.掌握生命力、5.新人類通病、6.領袖特質發展之醫療觀、7.善用醫療資源網路、8.未來基因新療法、9.由健保財務危機看新發展潮流、10.急症新趨勢與預防、11.如何自我建診、12.親子醫療新方向、13.健康全方位人格發展新趨勢-4Q學習、14.生命奇蹟-心肺復甦術理論與演練、15.醫療市場與策略之新趨勢。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講、情境實習演練。
description.en: This course aims to acquaint students with the new trend of medical treatment. From a medical perspective, students will be furnished with new ideas about health.  With practical training and application, students will have a better understanding of life values.The contents of this course include: (1) New perspective on medical relations and consultation (2) How to talk to doctors  (3) Medical Ethics on intensive care (4) The mastering of your life-force (5) The common failing of the new generation (6) A medical observation on leadership qualities (7) How to make use of the internet resources (9) Financial crisis caused by health insurance and the future development (10) The new idea about emergency cases and their prevention (11) Self-exam on health (12) New medical theory on parent-child treatment (13) 4Q-multi-dimensional development of personality (14) Miracles-the theory and practice of CPR (15) New trend on the medical market and strategy.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion, spe

description.zh: 深入一層探討素描，增加複雜，及難度。修過素描（一）或有基礎之同學，均可修此課程。使用四開紙，靜物之種類增加，例如水果、蔬菜、酒瓶、襯布所構成之畫面，要能加以構圖，而後表現各類物品之質感，以及玻璃之透明感。亦包括人物速寫、交通工具，以及較複雜之建築物寫生。要求作畫速度與準確度相互配合，每幅作品兩週完成。
description.en: Study sketching further in order to increase its complexity and sophistication.  This class is limited to students who have taken the Sketch (I) course.Quarto papaer shall be used to paint various still life, for example, fruits, vegetables, wine bottles and composition of a picture on canvas.  It is important to conceive the picture first and then express the quality of each object and the transparency of glass.  It also includes the sketch of figure painting, transportation and complex architecture. The coordination of painting speed and precision is important, as each painting shall be completed within two weeks.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 『誰掌握了資訊，誰就獲得先機』。二十世紀人類進入資訊時代，資料型態愈趨多元，各類資訊排山倒海而來，人們不再擔心資訊不足，反倒擔憂『資訊氾濫』，多的不得了。在如此多的資訊中，如何去作最有效的選擇與利用，將是知識份子必備的技能。課程內容包括：科學簡介(定義、特興、方法、發展)、科技指標與各類型資料之介紹與利用。
description.en: "Whoever holds the information takes advantage." With an approach to the information age of the 21st century, people are faced with various types of information, which rushes to us like a flood. People are not worried about being lack of information; instead, they are more worried about a "deluge of information." Encountered with so much information, each of the individual intellectuals finds it essential to know how to pick and make use of -with efficiency--the information in need. This type of ability has become a fundamental skill for modern people. The topics covered in this course include: Introduction to Science (Definition, Properties, Approaches and Development), Technological Indexes, and a diverse types of information.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。

(2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 在上學期開設，一學期，兩學分。斷限：始於日據時期，止於七十年代，以台灣白話文學之生發演進史程為主軸。範圍：涵蓋文字改革運動，第一次鄉土文學論戰，第二次鄉土文學論戰，  本土化文學思想研析、及作品選讀。要求：學期報告一份、期末考。
description.en: Period: From the Japanese sovereighty to the 1980's; emphasizing the history of the vernacular literature. Topics: The movement of the language revolution; the first controversy of folk literature; the second controversy of folk literature; analysis of the literary localization movement and the study of selected works.Requirements: One term paper and a final exam.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生明瞭中國及西洋人生哲學的歷史發展，並介紹人生哲學的內在涵義，分別探究人的意義、特性、人性論、真善美聖等問題；兼及人生哲學的當代意義：包括各種人生觀、生命的尊嚴、愛與婚姻及修養等探究。使知、情、意能融為一體，藉以確立個人理性的生命追尋目標。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to enable students to realize historical development in Chinese and Western philosophy of life by introducing the inner connotation of philosophy of life and studying the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life, humanism, virtue, good and beauty, etc..  Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 素描是一切繪畫基礎，設計產品，有美的意念，還要有能力將之畫出來，才算完成，否則即成空泛理論。(一)鉛筆練習：線條方向、明暗度變化、立體概念、光影效果等。(二)方形器物練習：以平移法正確掌握立方體造形，並將明暗效果表現出來。(三)圓柱體練習：畫易開罐飲料罐，能繪出其質感效果和細部文字、圖樣。(四)圓形物練習：能把握造形、質感、量感、光澤，以水果為練習對象，如蘋果、橘子等。(五)多種形體練習：如松果、貝殼、落葉等，均能把握其造形、質感、光影特色。由完全沒有概念開始，訓練至有寫生能力，也學得耐心、細心和觀察力。
description.en: Sketch is the base of painting. The product design and concept of beauty must be expressed; otherwise, it will become only a talk.Contents:1.Pencil practicing: lining, chiaroscuro, cubism, lighting, etc.2.Square ware practicing: controlling the cubism styling with a horizontal movement, also, expressing chiaroscuro, etc.3.Cylinder practicing: drawing beverage can with the sense of its quality, detail, and picture.4.Round object practicing: styling, quality, quantity, luster; also, drawing fruit, such as, apple, orange, etc.5.Multiple-shape practicing: such as, pin cines, shell, falling leaves with the sense of styling, quality, lighting, etc.The course is to train students who have are inexperienced to sketch with the ability of patient, detailing, and observation.

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 自動膨脹閥冷凍系統、溫度式膨脹閥冷凍系統、電子式膨脹閥冷凍系統、雙溫冷凍系統、低溫冷凍系統、運輸冷凍系統、電子冷凍系統及各型冷凍系統之實習實驗。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of capillary refrigeration system, automatic expansion valve refrigeration system, thermoelectric expansion valve refrigeration system, multi-temperature refrigeration system, absorption refrigeration system, vortex refrigeration system, thermoelectric refrigeration system.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 在 -50°C到 -100°C溫度範圍內，是工業冷凍和生物基因晶化工程領域常被應用到的低溫系統技術。主要是利用混合型冷媒之不同沸點差異，利用蒸汽壓縮機進行多段壓縮循環，如此，可在壓縮比到相當程度時，吸收器具有到達 -60°C或 -70°C的能力。相對地，壓縮機之壓力有時需達特定之高壓或真空狀態，以維持低溫製造能力。故低溫系統技術是工業食品與現代醫藥生物科技之關鍵項目。本課程包含下列各項內容︰1. 低溫冷媒物循環特性。2. 低溫與真空系統循環技術。3. 多段式低溫冷凍熱交換特性。4. 低溫與真空裝置材料選擇。5. 低溫冷媒物熱傳導熱力學特性。6. 其他各種低溫系統技術應用。
description.en: At the completion Low-temperature & Vacuum Systems Technology of this course, students will be to grasp the followings:1. Refrigerants for low-temperature circuit2. Low-temperature refrigeration cycles technologies.3. Heat transfer characteristics of multi-stage low-temperature refrigeration.4. Choice of construction materials in the low-temperature systems.5. Thermodynamic properties of low-temperature refrigerants.6. Application technologies for low-temperature & vacuum systems.

description.zh: 內容包括材料彈塑性變形，差排，高溫變形，低溫拉伸破壞，高溫破壞及疲勞。
description.en: The contents include elastic and plastic deformation in materials，dislocations，high temperature deformation，tensile fracture at low temperature，high temperature fracture and fatigue。

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 空調元件熱流原理及電腦數值模式之建立時(壓縮機、熱交換器、閥)；資料迴歸分析；空調系統性能模擬分析；系統電腦數值程式撰寫；參數分析、空調元件選擇及設計；經濟分析；最佳化技術之利用。
description.en: Theoreticla principle and computer simulation of air-condition and refrigerant components (compressor, heat ex hanger, valve); data fitting; simulation and perforamnce analysis of air-condition system; selection and design of air-conditon and refrigeration component; economic evaluation; optimization techniques.

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程為大學部「電磁波」課程之延伸，強調無線通訊工程中常用之相關電磁波解析技巧，包括時間簡諧電磁場，物質的電性研究，高等電磁理論與原理、以及其他微波與毫米波新型技術
description.en: This course encompasses the most complete treatment on the electromagnetics for wireless communication engineering. It includes the physical and mathematical foundations of the theory of advanced electromagnetics, time-harmonic electromagnetic fields, electrical properties of matter, and other novel topics related to modern microwave and millimeter-wave technology.

description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probabaility and random processes. It includes probability measures,random variables,law of large number,random processes and stationaryprocesses.The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Robust Control 的理論基礎與其應用，其目的在使同學能具有分析不定參數系統之能力。 主要內容包括: 不定參數數學模式建立、線性分式轉換、Lyapunov 分析。此外，強健控制中常用的H∞ 控制及μ合成技術亦將在課程中介紹。
description.en: 1. Introduction.2. Mathematical preliminaries for robust control.3. Uncertainty modeling4. Lyapunov analysis5. H∞ control6. μ synthesis7.  Case studyThis is an advanced course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to analyze linear systems with varying uncertainties. Concepts such as uncertainty, linear fractional transformation, and Lyapunov analysis are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also introduces the H∞ control and the μ synthesis techniques which are the main streams in the robust control.

description.zh: 解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能,如何配合造型設計及啟發造形創意,使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧,由忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感.形狀.體積.色彩等等,再深入到表現.特色.機能.價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera(large format camera)to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques.The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product(showing the right material quality,surface texture,the form,volume,weight and color).Furthermore,the sturents are requested to learn,to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character,function,value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 唐代為中國文學極盛之時代，而其光彩足以越邁古今者，莫若詩歌。唐詩有古體、近體之分，近體詩分五言律、七言律、五言絕、七言絕四種。本課程之教授以近體詩為主。唐近體詩之作者極多，本課程之教授以最有名之詩人與詩篇為主。除強調多讀多背之外，尚教以吟唱練習，教授內容有宜蘭酒令、天籟調、福建調，與江西調。
description.en: Tang Dynasty marks the climax of the Chinese literature.  Of all the literary genres, the achievements of Tang poetry, in particular, are superior to that of any other period. Tang poetry has two different styles: archaic and contemporary.  The contemporary style includes five-word lu, seven-word lu, five-word chueh, seven-word chueh, the best of which are the foci of this course.  In addition to reading and memorization, the practice of poem-singing is emphasized.  The contents include: Yi-lan chiu-lin, Tien-lai Tiao, Fu-kien Tiao, and Kiang-si Tiao.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: Modern Physics is one of fundamental electro-optics program courses. From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical  compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal  structures.  Application examples are introduced in the  fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical  industry, etc..

description.zh: 環境地質的調查與研究、以了解自然資源之使用與未來的展望。內容包括：水、土壤、礦產資源、能源開發、認識地質作用對人類生存環境的影響、認識自然災害，瞭解人為破壞引起的災害，地質環境改變，人類衛生環境的影響，及各種廢料處理。
description.en: This course introduce how water、soil、mineral and rock resources、energy exploit and geology processes influence human activities, recognize the geology hazards,the geologic aspects of pollution and waste-disposal problems, and several other topics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning , core concept , importance , scope , implement conditions , methodology . QC tool of TQM. And management tools, methodology, and problems for respected result.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：1.解聯立方程式2.矩陣運算3.行列式4.向量空間5.線性轉換6.特徵值及特徵向量7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用、實驗器材介紹、機構選用實例及實習。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors,        Introduction to Lab. Instruments, Examples and Lab's of mechanism selection.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

name.en: Changes and Development in the Taiwan Economy

description.zh: 一個社會的經濟發展造成社會結構的改變，整個社會的政治參與程度也隨之提高。台灣經齋發展提供了政治民主化和價值多元化觀念孕育的環境。這個舉世公認的經濟成就是如何締造的？本課程將以學術理論深入分析她的發展策略，解析這數十年來經濟變遷與發展的過程，以及所呈現的目題癥結與特徵，並尋求它的解決之道與未來發展的正確方向。
description.en: The economic development of a society tends to result in the transformation of its social structure and an increase in the political participation of its people. The economic development of the Taiwan economy has provided an environment contributing to political democratization and multi-valued concepts. How has this well-recognized economic development been established ? This course aims at exploring development strategies in depth, based on theories , analyzing the process of transformation and development of the Taiwan economy in the past several decades. Examining problems caused by this transformation the developing process and their characteristics , and seeking potential solutions and right directions for the future Taiwan economic development will also be examined.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitation of chemical reactions. Its goal is to successfully design and operate chemical reactors. This advanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems. After study in this course, the students can obtain clear and unified concept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程以實務應用為主，使學生在熟悉基本焚化原理後，利用國內現有中、小型爐為例，介紹焚化系統之整體規劃與設計方法，包括系統選擇評估，爐型與規格之設計，後處理評選等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to promote the knowledge of incineration system for students. This course focuses on concept and basic principle with the following items: 1.Introduction.2.Basic theory of combustion.3.Performance of incinerator.4.Basic design.5.Preliminary planning.6.Air pollution control devices.

description.zh: 課程介紹單元有包括：(1)噪音檢測指標(音壓、音功率、音強度、dB、Leq、L10、Ld 、Ln及Ldn等)之計算、(2)各種噪音種類(總音源、面音源、線音源)、(3)噪音對人體的影響(聽力損失及遮蔽作用等)、(4)噪音測定與定與評估、(5)振動之定義與測定、(6)噪音振動之控制(音源及傳播路徑的控制)等，應足以供往後更進一步之噪音防制應用、(7)防治噪音控制案例說明。
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the theory of sound propagation and transmission. The topic is including important industrial noise sources and sound measurement equipments, selection of appropriate noise criteria and control methods, noise abatement technology, laboratory studies and case histories.

description.zh: 隨著工業化的進展,土壤污染日益嚴重,由早期之鎘米事件,引起世人對於土壤污染之重視,本課程分別就土壤污染之定義,土壤污染之種類,土壤污染之來源,土壤污染之影響,土壤污染之危害介紹,以使受業者能有一全盤之了解.
description.en: The soil pollution in Taiwan are more and more serious by industrial development.From earlly Cd-rice event,people are focus to the soil pollution,This topic is going to edaling about the definition of soil pollution,the kinds of soil pollution,the sources of soil pollution,the effective of soil pollution,and the hazard of soil pollution.

description.zh: 能源概論，熱力學，非再生能源，再生能源的利用，能源的有效變換，未來能源的發展形態，有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。
description.en: General introduction, thermodynamics, non-renewable energy, use of renewable energy, energy conversion, future development, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, energy effectiveness, energy management.

description.zh: 軌道車輛轉向架系統，軌道的設計，輪軌關係，軌道工程專用術語。
description.en: Boige System，Track Design，Relationships between Wheel and Track，Track Terms .

description.zh: 1. 機率空間2. 隨機變數、向量、程序3. 期望值，隨機序列的收斂性和大數法則4. 穩定性隨機程序5. 有用的隨機程序
description.en: 1. probability space2. Random variable, vectors and processes3. Expectation ,converges of random sequence and Law of large number4. Stationary processes and ergodic propertis5. Useful random processes

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程就化工分離程序在生物技術產品回收之應用進行理論及實務上之說明，其中程序包括、膜過濾、蛋白質沉澱、吸附及結晶等以及管柱層析等。

name.zh: 行動網際網路技術與應用

description.zh: 本課程的目的在協助學生了解新興及行動通訊產業的技術基礎及未來應用發展。希望藉由課程討論激發與課人員探討無線科技能產生的新應用並進一步以小組專案方式擬出行動應用可行的商業方案。主要課題包括：1.無線通訊系統演進簡介2.無線/公眾區域網路技術與應用3.行動通訊系統技GSM/GPRS/3G 4.行動加值服務應用與規劃5.加值服務商業模式探討6.行動商務及行動付款服務規劃7.行動定位服務探討8.第三代行動通訊概況
description.en: This course focused at the Mobile Internet both Technology and Application related topics. It is designed to bridge the GAP between Internet and Mobile communication (both Wireless LAN & Cellular communication) using system architecture and value-added services examples. The discussion topics will include: 1.Overview of Wireless Communication Systems 2.[Public]Wireless LAN Technology/System Architecture & Applications 3.Introduction of Cellular communication: GSM/GPRS/3G 4.Mobile Value-Added Service (M-VAS) Planning 5.M-VAS Business Model discussion 6.Mobile Commerce & Mobile Payment 7.Mobile Positioning System & Location-Base Service 8. 3G Service NOW

description.zh: 本課程主要探討下列音訊編碼技術：MP-3,Dolby AC-3及DTS。課程內容涵蓋下列項目:1.複習數位訊號處理 2.CD片聲音還原 3.多相位分解 4.次頻段音訊編碼5.個案研究:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC,AC-3及DTS 6.MPEG-4合成音樂簡介
description.en: 1.This course mainly discusses various audio coding schemes such as MP-3,Dolby AC-3,and DTS.Topics covered in the course include:1.Review of digital signal processing 2.Audio reproduction from CD3.Polyphase decomposition4.Subband coding of audio signals5.Psychoacoustic models6.Case studies:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC, AC-3,and DTS7.Introduction to Synthetic audio in MPEG-4

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer in Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配。
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers, Design of sensing element, Signal Conditioning Circuit Design, Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor, Fabrication of sensor, Selection and Application of the sensors.

description.zh: 本課程以講授計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到幾種目前廣泛使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器用的路由協定為主。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer.  Popular physical layer medias are discussed first.  Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion.  Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容在於設計一微控制器系統。除基本的微控制器架構外，微控制器所需要的硬體介面及時序均會在本課程中討論。
description.en: The topics of this course include micro-controller system design.  Beside the fundamental structure of a micro-controller system, the hardware interfaces and the timing sequence of I/O devices will be discussed.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。本課程包括幾何光學及物理光學。在幾何光學方面，將探討稜鏡反射鏡以及透鏡之成像原理。簡易之光學系統亦將討論。在物理光學方面，將探討光之傳播、偏振、干涉、繞射等原理。此外，傅氏光學干涉儀以及全像術亦將探討。
description.en: Optics is one of fundamental electro-optics program courses. It consists two parts: Geometrical Optics and Physical Optics. In Geometrical Optics, theories of imaging in prisms, mirrors, and lenses are discussed. Fundamental optical system are also studied. In Physical Optics, light propagation, polarization, interference and diffraction theories are studied. Besides, Fourier optics, interferometry and holography are also discussed.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

description.zh: 環境規與管理是一門跨學科極為重要的整合性課程，討論內容包括：(1)環境問題與社會、(2)環境經濟學、(3)環境政策、(4)環境規劃原理與方法、(5)環境質量管理、(6)環境保護規劃技術、(7)環境影響評估、(8)土地利用與國土規劃、(9)區域性環境管理、(10)都市環境之管理、(11)環境保護管理制度、(12)自然資源與景觀維護以及永續發展之環境管理等。
description.en: Environmental Planning and Management aims to study the relationship between environmental problems and social, economics and ecology. The theory and technology of planning are also described. The environmental impact assessment is a major method for the approching of balance between economical development and environmental protection, therefore it is stressed to state it's contents and assessment methods. Further the National planning and City planning in the area of environmental espects are also described in the course. It intends to let the students realize how to have a sustainable development under the policy of environmental protection.
